# simd_make_char8(_:)

**Function**

Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements set to zero.

## Declaration

```swift
func simd_make_char8(_ other: CChar) -> simd_char8
```

## Functions to Create Eight-Element Vectors From Scalar Values

- **simd_make_char8_undef(_:)**: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements undefined.

items.description: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements undefined.
